fits.name: Halo
fits.personality: I feature a mid-waist design with an edgy distressed finish and a flattering ankle-cut silhouette. I'm the perfect fit for the bold trendsetter who loves to make a statement effortlessly.

fits.name: Heidi
fits.personality: I offer a high-waist skinny leg with extra length for tall beauties who want that sleek, elongated look. I'm the perfect fit for the confident woman who demands both comfort and sophistication.

fits.name: La Reve
fits.personality: I have a mid-waist cut in a rich dark wash with tall-girl friendly inseam for maximum versatility. I'm the perfect fit for the minimalist who values timeless style and all-day comfort.

fits.personality: I feature a mid-waist rise with distressed detailing and an ankle-cut hem for that lived-in cool-girl vibe. I'm the perfect fit for the free spirit who effortlessly blends comfort with street-style edge.
